Pattern Library

Single dropdown

  • Notes
  • HTML
  • Info

There are no notes for this item.

<legend>Chosen Dropdown</legend>
<div id="dropdown3"></div>

<script>
    console.log('start of script')
    dropdownData = ["A", "B", "C"]
    d3.select("#dropdown3")
        .append("select")
        .attr("id", "droppy2")
        .attr("style", "width:100%")
        .attr("tabindex", "0")
        .attr("data-placeholder", "Choose a letter")
    d3.select("#droppy2")
        .append("option")
    d3.select("#droppy2")
        .selectAll("p")
        .data(dropdownData)
        .enter()
        .append("option")
        .attr("value", function(d) {
            return d
        })
        .text(function(d) {
            return d
        });
    $('#droppy2').chosen({
        allow_single_deselect: true,
        no_results_text: "No results found for:"
    })
</script>
  • Handle: @single-dropdown
  • Preview:
    • With layout
    • Component only
  • Filesystem Path: components/2-elements/single-dropdown/single-dropdown.hbs
